name: Contaminated Traffic Signs
description: Traffic sign is no longer recognizable and needs to be cleaned

name: Wild Weed Growth
description: Wild weeds on the sidewalk or roadside

name: Overfilled Trash Bin
description: Trash is already lying next to the trash bin

name: Illegal Waste Disposal
description: Unauthorized dumping of bulky waste or other piles of trash

name: Illegally Parked Vehicle
description: Illegally parked vehicle obstructing garbage collection and needs towing
